description.originalText:
Our former nanny is looking for a full-time position starting ASAP. We only parted ways due to differing scheduling needs. She cared for our baby from 4 to 8 months old, and we were very pleased with her loving, attentive care.

- Excellent at sticking to nap schedules and getting the baby to sleep.
- Took our little one to the playground regularly for fresh air and outdoor fun.
- Made homemade baby food and ensured all meals were healthy and nourishing.
- Helped with light housework such as emptying/loading the dishwasher and folding laundry.
- Kept us updated with pictures throughout the day, and was easy to communicate with.
- Trusted with important tasks like taking our baby to doctorâ€™s appointments.

With years of experience caring for children of all ages, she is reliable, nurturing, and has a true passion for working with kids. She loves working on the Upper West Side!

Wonderful Nanny Available

Dear Parents: Our wonderful nanny, Lala, as we lovingly call her, is parting ways with us at the end of the month, and we wholeheartedly recommend her to any new family looking for a full-time, long term nanny. Lala stood out among the candidates that we interviewed, and we knew that she was the perfect match for our then 5 month old son, who is now starting a full-time 2s program. Lala came to us with over 20 years of experience, and her past families had nothing but wonderful things to say about her.

As first time parents with demanding jobs, Lala eased our transition back to work. We never questioned leaving our son with her, and trusted that he was in the best care. Lala is honest, reliable, punctual, loving, and has consistently displayed good judgment with anything relating to our son. She communicates with us throughout the day, sending us photos of our son playing and providing updates on his day. Lala and our son sing, play, dance, and learn together - she has been such a positive influence on him, keeping him socially and intellectually engaged throughout the day by reading to him, taking him to music classes and the park, and arranging playdates with his friends.

We know beyond a doubt that she would be a wonderful addition to any family.

description.displayText:
EXCELLENT ONE OF A KIND NANNY!

We unfortunately are leaving New York City and relocating to the suburbs and so have to say goodbye to our incredible nanny/second mom to our 1.5 year old son.

Lafleur has been caring for him since he was 3 months old. He absolutely adores her and we know he'll be devastated once we leave.  

Every morning/afternoon he gives her a huge hug, smiles and babbles.

We can't say enough good things about Lafleur, she came to us with 20 years of experience, excellent references and stood out amongst all the nannies we interviewed. She's trustworthy, reliable, patient, nurturing, diligent and amazing with newborns. We're never worried leaving home because we know our son is in great hands. She keeps our home spotless and perfectly organized.

She will be an excellent addition to your family.

We are more than happy to provide a great reference!

description.displayText: La Fleur has worked for us for 2.5 years taking care of our 3 year-old son since he was about 6 months old.  She came to us with about 18 years of experience and stood out among all the other candidates we interviewed. She is sweet, caring, dedicated, outgoing, energetic, trustworthy, hardworking, and pays a lot of attention to cleanliness, germs/hygiene, and child safety.   We always felt reassured leaving our son in La Fleur's care and she was particularly helpful in quickly getting him on a consistent sleeping and eating schedule. We were often told by the neighbors, doormen, teachers and other nannies that they are very fond of her and that we are lucky to have found someone like La Fleur who watches our son so diligently while always having a big smile on her face. Although we, and especially our son, are heartbroken to part ways with her due to our relocation, we know that she'll be an asset to any family.

description.displayText: LaFleur interviewed for our family and also did one "test run" where she spent the afternoon with the kids while I was at home. I really liked LaFleur and thought she seemed very reliable and trustworthy. She was great with the kids. We wound up hiring another nanny due to issues unrelated to LaFleur.
description.originalText: LaFleur interviewed for our family and also did one "test run" where she spent the afternoon with the kids while I was at home. I really liked LaFleur and thought she seemed very reliable and trustworthy. She was great with the kids. We wound up hiring another nanny due to issues unrelated to LaFleur.

description.displayText:
Lafleur worked as our outstanding nanny from February 2008-August 2010. Lafleur joined our family when our two boys were nearly 3 years old and 9 months old respectively. She looked after them both full time, aside from times that my older son was in preschool. When we moved back to England we were very sad to say goodbye to her and we've stayed in touch ever since. 

I have nothing but praise for Lafleur. She is bright, trustworthy, punctual, honest, professional, respectful, organized and altogether an invaluable member of our family whom I and my children grew to love and respect. Lafleur came to the position with an excellent prior reference, having worked with a family for more than seven years.

description.displayText: La Fleur is absolutely wonderful!  She has been working for our family for the past three and a half years, starting with us when our daughter was three months old and now cares for her (3 years old) and her younger sister (1 year old).  La Fleur is everything you could ask for in a caregiver: loving, responsible, conscientious, active, and our daughters love her.  Both give her huge smiles and hugs as she walks through the door in the morning and are sad to see her go at the end of the day.  La Fleur is outgoing and has made friends for our daughters and arranges frequent play dates in the neighborhood.  She is organized and makes caring for two children look easy!  Our neighbors often stop me to say how lucky we are to have found such a terrific nanny.  We agree she is truly special!
